title: No popup menu in Java editor ruler (Photon)
description: In the Photon version of the Java editor, the popup menu in the left vertical ruler does not appear when right-clicking on it. This menu should allow users to add breakpoints or marks, but it is not functioning as intended.
OB:
1) Open a java editor
2) Right click on the left vertical ruler

Expected Behavior:
A popup menu should appear, allowing the user to add breakpoints/marks, etc.
EB:
1) Open a java editor
2) Right click on the left vertical ruler

Observed Behavior:
No popup menu appears when right-clicking on the left vertical ruler.
SR:
1) Open a java editor
2) Right click on the left vertical ruler

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Open a Java editor.
2. Right-click on the left vertical ruler.

Expected Behavior:
A popup menu should appear, allowing the user to add breakpoints/marks, etc.
